name: Sociology of Cities and Urban Life
description: A theoretical and empirical examination of the processes of urbanization and suburbanization. Considers classic and contemporary approaches to the ecology and social organization of the pre-industrial, industrial, corporate and postmodern cities.
prerequisites: [[(SOCA01H3) and (SOCA02H3)] or SOCA03Y3] or [any 4.0 credits and enrolment in the Minor in Culture, Creativity, and Cities, or the Major/Major Co-op in City Studies]
